sub_title: I [re] position & [re] brand small businesses for accelerated growth & sustainable results
summary:
​I am an Amsterdam-based dutchified Parisian, Brand Therapist at heart & by profession.

My core business in my small international brand agency Incubator Studio is to work (in French and/or English) on the [re]positioning of small businesses (solo-preneurs, start-ups, scale-ups, SMEs) & then turn this strategy into messages that resonate & sell, a visual identity, a website & appropriate communication activities.

Together with my business partner Coralie Rocque, we are on duty to strengthen the positioning & branding of small companies to fight economic waste. Not of the type of those who give up.

"Make your life a dream🛸 & a dream, a reality🪂."

aurelie@incubator.studio

profile_positions.title: ​Positioning Strategist & Brand Therapist

profile_positions.description:
Real luxury for urban (wo)men? Pure products & simple rituals, inspired by Nature's wisdom; good for their skin, their well-being & our planet. LUUX care® reveals and boosts their natural beauty & inner strength thanks to:
* professional LED Light Therapy lamps
* exclusive hydromasks full of active principles
* 100% natural and organic certified cosmetics
* 100% natural and organic certified herbal teas
* 100% natural food supplements
* franchised LED Light Therapy treatment rooms, the light bar®

If you are a balance, beauty or well-being professional in Europe, we would like you to experience LED Light Therapy the light bar® way. We create and train LED Light therapists who understand the value brought by adding this technology to their existing businesses to the benefit of their clients.

www.luuxcare.com
www.thelightbar.nl

Find out more on:
- our LinkedIn company page
- our Insta, Facebook, Youtube accounts

aurelie.becat@luuxcare.com
profile_positions.title: Managing Partner & LED Skin Therapy Expert

profile_positions.description:
I leverage the power of branding, marketing & my business sense to design a sustainable growth plan for companies feeling ready to successfully grow/boost their product/service sales to the next level. I use a three steps methodology:

★ Positioning & branding: product/service definition, personas description, value proposition, niche identification, pricing, competition analysis => business tagline/mission/vision/values/USPs, networking/commercial pitches, new brand visual identity, website revamp...
★ Agile marketing and sales: digital marketing, content, PR, events, direct and indirect sales channels development => growth plan.
★ Team training and/or outsourcing of specialists => plan execution by the client's team, hired staff or myself if you need a sales ambassador.

I work as an independent brand strategist & business developer and serve several clients in parallel. Reach out to me if you are ready to embark on a structured and efficient marketing and sales journey!

www.acekettle.com
profile_positions.title: Sales & Marketing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
I developed an exclusive shoes business in Malaysia with a business partner. 

-	Designed collections of kids & adults leather sandals and closed school shoes.
-	Sourced in Malaysia and lead the prototyping/pre-production/production process with six suppliers. 
-	Created a brand, its universe, visual identity and the associated story telling.
- Defined the marketing and sales strategy for Year 1 and scale up phase. 
-	Sold >700 units in four months, to end customers via showrooms, pop up shops, bazaars and online sales.

volunteer_experiences.role: Vice President Membership Amsterdam Toastmasters Club
volunteer_experiences.description:
Toastmasters is an educational organization that offers a public speaking and leadership skills development track through a worldwide network of clubs. By regularly giving prepared and impromptu speeches, receiving feedback, managing meetings and teams, and guiding others to achieve their goals in a supportive atmosphere, members are empowered and develop their communication skills to lead.


Within the Executive Committee of the Amsterdam Toastmasters Club, I plan, organize and direct a program that:
- ensures existing members' retention, development, motivation and growth;
- promotes Amsterdam Toastmasters Club, brings in guests and transforms them into active dedicated members.

https://toastmasters.nl/en

If you want to attend a meeting as a guest or consider becoming a member, contact me at amsterdamtoastmasters@gmail.com

Under the aegis of Fondation Caritas France, Fondation Heloise Charruau facilitates access of underprivileged communities to education, vocational training, adequate medical care, and social life.

My assignment is to support and coordinate projects remotely and on the field, working hand in hand with the President of the Fondation and with teams within the communities, in order to make sure that our investments in the infrastructure bear fruit on the long run, thanks to a well though planification of future autonomy.

Currently, my main focus is on a group of 30+ villages around Alfa-Kpara, next to Djougou, North Benin. Together with the local community, we are raising funds for several approved projects:
- upgrading of the two boarding schools of Alfa Kpara by the provision of beds and mattresses for 250 girls and boys between 6 and 15 yo,
- construction of an additional kindergarten school with a well, water pump and solar panels,
- construction of a well in the remote village of Kpaukpau,
- IT, audio and technical equipment to the benefit of Christians-Muslims dialogue in a group of about 30 remote villages,
- medical equipment of the new dispensary currently being built next to the primary school and boarding schools of Alfa Kpara.
https://www.fondationheloisecharruau.org/benin-envoi-dune-volontaire-dediee-a-la-structuration-et-la-croissance-de-loeuvre-educative-dalfa-kpara/

Would you be willing to share skills, time and drive on top of money, please make yourself known!

www.fondationheloisecharruau.org
